column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the tonkatsu black (No. 1) with thick noodles.  Each menu item states the type of noodle that it is served with
column2: but you can opt for which kind you'd like.  The broth was very rich and flavorful
column3: and the noodles were cooked well.  A piece of my pork chashu was a bit tough and dry
column4: but overall the meal was delicious.  Definitely one of the better spots to get ramen in Houston!
